revised_title: Exploration of Oestrogenic Properties in Condensed Carbon-Ring Compounds
tldr: The authors investigated the oestrogenic properties of various condensed carbon-ring compounds, finding that some synthetic compounds with known molecular structures showed significant physiological activity. They also discovered a correlation between oestrogenic and carcinogenic properties, raising the question of whether natural oestrogenic hormones may be involved in the production of malignant tumours.
